alert.note: Alert for Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 4:57AM CDT until May 29 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LYON...NORTHERN OSCEOLA...EASTERN ROCK...NOBLES... MURRAY AND SOUTHEASTERN PIPESTONE COUNTIES... At 456 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chandler to near Adrian to near Little Rock, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Rushmore, Chandler and Lake Wilson around 500 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wilmont, Sibley, Worthington, Slayton, Fulda, Currie, Lake Shetek State Park, Ocheyedan, Brewster, Dovray, Round Lake and Harris. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
